client.controller

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.controller.Client
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Owner

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    The Client class for the tool shop application
    Since:
    March 30th 2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sean Kenny and Jean-David Rousseau

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Client()
      creates a frame and listeners, also initializes the permission controller and coms manager.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearEntries()
      clears all entries in the GUI and clears the ID list within Client
      void endConnection()
      closes the connection of this client
      void endSession()
      closes the window
      client.controller.CommunicationManager getComsManager()
      returns the comsManager for this user
      GUI getFrame()
      get the GUI that is owned by this client
      int idAtIndex(int index)
      returns the ID at an index
      boolean isConnected()
      returns true if the client is connected, false otherwise
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      creates a Client.
      boolean manageDecreaseQuantityRequest(int idOfToolToDecreaseQuantityOf, int quantityToDecreaseBy)
      manages a request to decrease the quantity of a given tool, returns whether it was successful since errors produced by this function should be managed elsewhere
      void manageGetAllToolsRequest()
      sends a message to get all items, reads all the items, and then displays them on the GUI
      void manageLoginRequest(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Handles a login request by giving asking the coms manager to send a message and giving the work to the permission controller.
      void manageLogoutRequest()
      tells the permission controller to change the permission to guest
      void manageSearchRequest(java.lang.String searchTerm)
      Handles a search request by clearing the GUI's entries and then searching for a given term
      java.lang.String requestItemInfo(int specifiedID)
      requests info for an item with a specific ID
      void setUpConnection(java.lang.String serverName, int portNumber)
      sets up a connection at a given serverName and portNumber
      void startSession()
      opens the window

    • Method Detail

      • manageLoginRequest

        public void manageLoginRequest(java.lang.String username,
                               java.lang.String password)
        Handles a login request by giving asking the coms manager to send a message and giving the work to the permission controller.
        Parameters:
        username - username that the GUI detected
        password - the password that the GUI detected

      • manageSearchRequest

        public void manageSearchRequest(java.lang.String searchTerm)
        Handles a search request by clearing the GUI's entries and then searching for a given term
        Parameters:
        searchTerm - the term to search for

      • manageLogoutRequest

        public void manageLogoutRequest()
        tells the permission controller to change the permission to guest

      • manageGetAllToolsRequest

        sends a message to get all items, reads all the items, and then displays them on the GUI

      • manageDecreaseQuantityRequest

        public boolean manageDecreaseQuantityRequest(int idOfToolToDecreaseQuantityOf,
                                             int quantityToDecreaseBy)
        manages a request to decrease the quantity of a given tool, returns whether it was successful since errors produced by this function should be managed elsewhere
        Parameters:
        idOfToolToDecreaseQuantityOf - the ID of the item we want to decrease the quantity of
        quantityToDecreaseBy - how much the quantity should be decreased by
        Returns:
        true if nothing went wrong, false otherwise

      • requestItemInfo

        public java.lang.String requestItemInfo(int specifiedID)
        requests info for an item with a specific ID
        Parameters:
        specifiedID - the ID of the tool we want info of
        Returns:
        the info for the item with the specified ID

      • setUpConnection

        public void setUpConnection(java.lang.String serverName,
                            int portNumber)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        sets up a connection at a given serverName and portNumber
        Parameters:
        serverName - the IP to connect to
        portNumber - the portnumber (should always be 9898)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if creating the connection was unsuccessful
